welcomePanel.message-1: Imagine there are 64 missing people, and you need to find one of them.
welcomePanel.message-2: The only way to find them using existing charity websites is to scroll through the 64 photos one-by-one.
welcomePanel.message-2.5: So, you would have to view 32 photos on average before finding them.
welcomePanel.message-3: However, by using the Reunite app, you'll find them in far fewer photos.
demo-info.open-pictures: Tap here to see the 64 missing people
demo-info.feedback: To give feedback, drop us an email at project.reunited@gmail.com.
demo-info.raise-issue: Or, if you find a bug feel free to raise an issue on our github repo.
demo-info.start-message: Choose one (in your head) to look for, then start searching for them
comparisonPanel.title: Who's more similar to your person?
comparisonPanel.subtitle: The questions are designed to maximise learning, so don't worry if some faces we show are unlike your person.
match-card.title: Is this your person?
confirm-match-dialog.title: Aid worker contacted
confirm-match-dialog.message: An aid worker has been contacted and is verifying the match, you will be contacted with further information.
no-match-dialog.message: No match was found, your choices will be stored and you will be contacted if a potential match is added to the system.
demo-summary.message-1: Number of steps to find your person:
demo-summary.message-4: fewer photos used than existing solution
server-error: Error receiving information from the server. Please check the server is running. If problem persists, contact a system admin.
error-dialog.title: Error
further-info.title: Demo Complete
further-info.feedback: Leave feedback to improve this prototype
